title: Establish WiFi connection between PC and E5373s-155
answer:
A: Please follow these steps to set up your WLAN 

 1. Enable your wireless network card and double click  ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=39161)icon displayed on windows start bar to open “Choose a wireless network” dialog 

 2. Select SSID of E5373s-155 in the local wireless device list (The WiFi Key and the SSID can be found on a label stick inside the back cover,or view the current SSID and wireless network encryption key on the screen), click![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=39162)  to connect.![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=39163) 

 3.       Input WiFi Key in the dialog of password input then click ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=39164) to establish connection(The WiFi Key and the SSID can be found on a label stick inside the back cover)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=39165) 

 4.       After the icon of wireless network card turned from![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=39166) (status of acquiring IP address ) into![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=39167) ,your PC has established WiFi connection with E5373s-155 successfully, enter http://192.168.8.1 in web browser (ex. IE) to visit Web UI
